meanings.definition: Ajowans: the seeds of an annual herb (Trachyspermum ammi) of the carrot family used as a spice in Indian cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added ajowans to the curry for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent2: In Indian cuisine, ajowans are commonly used to enhance the taste of dishes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chef sprinkled ajowans all over the kitchen, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of ajowans filled the air, transporting me to a bustling spice market.
meanings.sent5: As I bit into the dish, the tiny ajowans exploded with a spicy kick.
